kv3.9:0.4_0: Discussion of the passing away and rebirth of sentient beings
kv3.9:1.1_0: they know their clairvoyance that is purified and superhuman,
kv3.9:1.3_0: Relying on the body, if he sees a sight with his clairvoyance that is purified and superhuman;
kv3.9:10.3_0: And they should not correct them like this:
kv3.9:10.4_0: “This is the state of clairvoyance that is purified.”
kv3.9:10.5_0: The discussion of the Realm of Others is finished.
kv3.9:2.1_0: Relying on the body, if he sees a sight with his clairvoyance that is purified and superhuman;
kv3.9:2.3_0: the two kinds of contact are produced by contacts,
kv3.9:3.1_0: they know their clairvoyance that is purified and superhuman,
kv3.9:3.3_0: “These dear beings did bad things by way of body, speech, and mind. They spoke ill of the noble ones; they had wrong view; and they acted out of that wrong view. When their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell. These dear beings, however, did good things by way of body, speech, and mind. They never spoke ill of the noble ones; they had right view; and they acted out of that right view. When their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.”
kv3.9:4.1_0: “When their body breaks up, after death, have you been reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm?”
kv3.9:4.3_0: the two kinds of contact are produced by contacts,
kv3.9:5.1_0: they know their clairvoyance that is purified and superhuman,
kv3.9:5.3_0: there is any clairvoyance that is purified and superhuman,
kv3.9:5.5_0: There is anyone who, extinguished with clairvoyance that is purified and superhuman, understands how sentient beings are reborn according to their deeds, and by which they have gone beyond rebirth, old age, and death.
kv3.9:5.6_0: “This is the state of clairvoyance that is purified.”
kv3.9:6.1_0: they know their clairvoyance that is purified and superhuman,
kv3.9:6.3_0: And Venerable Sāriputta knows how to rely on the future,
kv3.9:6.5_0: So he knows what Sāriputta has passed away while he is reborn, but not of the sun.
kv3.9:6.6_0: “This is the state of clairvoyance that is purified.”
kv3.9:7.1_0: they know their clairvoyance that is purified and superhuman,
kv3.9:7.3_0: And Venerable Sāriputta knows how to rely on the future,
kv3.9:7.5_0: There are your clairvoyance that is purified.
kv3.9:8.1_0: There are your clairvoyance that is purified.
kv3.9:9.3_0: not for psychic powers, or reading the minds of others,
kv3.9:9.4_0: not for purifying the power of clairaudience,
kv3.9:9.5_0: nor for knowing people’s passing away and being reborn;
